metadata.title: CVE-2023-26253 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In Gluster GlusterFS 11.0, there is an xlators/mount/fuse/src/fuse-bridge.cnotify stack-based buffer over-read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-26253` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glusterfs-cli - 10.3-5
glusterfs-client - 10.3-5
glusterfs-common - 10.3-5
glusterfs-server - 10.3-5
libgfapi0 - 10.3-5
libgfchangelog0 - 10.3-5
libgfrpc0 - 10.3-5
libgfxdr0 - 10.3-5
libglusterd0 - 10.3-5
libglusterfs0 - 10.3-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glusterfs package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.3-5').
